documents.document: Already too much spinach dip and chilli. Now I've taken my seat next to the guacamole right where I'm supposed to be. #SuperBowl #ready4ribs
@hohmannkyle And he'll likely never know about the things you said. But I guess you hoped that. I hope not too.
@hohmannkyle So you know, Abdul is a hard-working, honest man supporting his family driving his taxi at night. He's good.
@hohmannkyle You didn't need DM before. I'm glad your friend's guitar is being returned. The stuff you said was untrue and unnecessary.
...to take it to. That's happening today.
Today is the first time someone was able to access that info for the "stolen" item. Transaction found. Taxi found. Driver now knows who...
FYI: transaction settlement happens at 11:59pm the day you use your cc in a Beck terminal. Not everyone has access to that info. #taxitips
Keep deleting the tweets. It's a good idea. Abdul is the nicest guy on earth and didn't want anyone's guitar. I can promise you that. ðŸ–•
This is some shit. I will likely use the middle finger emoji at some point today. My apologies. #sorrynotsorry
WAIT. Who found the guitar? Interested uneducated thief here. Although we both know who that was for. ðŸ˜’ https://t.co/Deq8AjINFX
@MooreintheAM Our mom gave cod liver oil pills in the mornings. I hope our front yard garden benefitted. Buried there daily lol.
@JIMrichards1010 drivers refusing should lose their licenses.
@JIMrichards1010 Glad to hear a Beck was there for you. If any were refusing give me the numbers!! I wish MLS did their job. #enforcement

Felix!! He's the best!! Driving taxi in Toronto for decades. We were talking about how great he is just today!â€¦ https://t.co/AkC3JSa7Jm

The people I get to work with: Jafar went to the burial of one of his regular customers, Elizabeth. Sent me a clip of the bagpipes. My heart
Great to meet Ali who has been driving taxi in Toronto for 20yrs. So happy to be welcoming "new" ppl to Beck. Welcome Ali! #BeckDriversRock
It's unfortunate the City's regulation of PTC vehicles has resulted a whole lot of them regulating themselves but she was great. #TOpoli
#TBT #Toronto City Council February 3, 2016 @kristynwongtam was amazing as she addressed taxi drivers. https://t.co/TMjz4Q391b #TOpoli
Had fun dispatching on channel 5 today! Good morning to Leslieville, Riverside and The Beach! ðŸ‘ #Toronto #local #taxilife
Love.This. Happy Birthday Everyone! #BestTeam https://t.co/eCwreFMUgi
@GclimoGeorge Sorry. He's on my team ;)
On a roll. Meet Emmanuel from Ghana.Remembers everything you tell him & asks abt each detail when he sees you again. https://t.co/vFrxjxbJu5
While I'm at it, meet Jafar. Immigrated to Canada from Iran. His wife Razi is pure sunshine and he knows it :) https://t.co/J88xluN49J
Fitz just left. He started driving in 1983! We always talk about customer service. He sets the bar. See him here: https://t.co/ORwBVhmQ6O
Fun conversations today! Gershon started driving in 1984. Lots of laughter when he comes in. He's the best.â€¦ https://t.co/azACGrKvA5
@valleylily56 It makes no sense. Still no idea about the cameras and who is inspecting them. Still no wheelchair accessible taxi training.
His 6-month taxi inspection normally happens 1st of February. He found out end of December it was closing Dec 31. No feedback since. #TOpoli
Mensur here today: "Hey Kristine. How will we know when they need our safety certificates? No one knows!". No answer. MLS?? Anyone?? #TOpoli
Thornton Blackburn escaped slavery in the US, came to CAN & started Toronto's first taxi company: https://t.co/nkM8HhlVCx #BlackHistoryMonth
First one and it's a winner! #RollUpTheRim https://t.co/PGuXOFgi4T

No one knows. I hope it doesn't come to that but there is no plan to speak of for the cameras in taxis. #TOpoliâ€¦ https://t.co/wrebxTpkWG
Mr. Berhane came in this morning. We spoke for a while. Just read this: https://t.co/KWUHPNzjjQ #people #Toronto #taxi
Great question. I'd like to get the answer. Bylaw requires cameras in taxis (not uberx) No idea who can inspect theâ€¦ https://t.co/0HNct7aF2G
Beck acknowledges more than 100 drivers every month for the praise they have received from the public for the work they do. Keep it coming!
It all sounds so familiar. Unfortunately taxi drivers and the public didn't get the support they needed. #TOpoliâ€¦ https://t.co/QwpvVQ7AGD
...Faisal got her home safely. She felt safe, that he handled the situation "in the best way possible". Well done Faisal. #Toronto #taxi
...the other man began to follow them in his car. Faisal stopped and waited for the car to pass with his doors locked, ready to call TPS...
A woman wrote about her experience when Faisal noticed her being threatened by a man on the street. Faisal stopped & got out of his taxi...
Meanwhile, Beck recognizes the great work of many taxi drivers based on feedback from Torontonians. Faisal is January's driver of the month.
...safety, and consumer protection have all been compromised." And here I those protections were the mandate of MLS. #TOpoli
TN: "In the City's rush to bring uberx under the bylaw - in the separate PTC category - the regulatory standards for driver, vehicle,...
Worse? The rules they did make are not being enforced anyway. Garbage? Tolls? They can't even do taxis. #TOpoli
I'll admit it. I held hope that what I was being told by city hall was true: same rules. It was explicit. What a fool I was. #TOpoli
...dollar foreign corporation unlimited entry in the once tightly restricted Toronto taxi market..." (no. of taxis still restricted) #TOpoli
"...Toronto's new Vehicle-For-Hire bylaw which has clearly tilted the playing field in favour of uberx - even granting the multi-billion...
An article in TN with the title "What cab the industry do to undo the damage from years of inept regulation by Toronto city hall?" Wow.
Wali runs a garage and say to TN re: taxi drivers: decision makers at city hall need to be reminded "these are real people". #TOpoli
Fahad (10yrs driving) tells TN: "Toronto is creating an example for how, if you have money, no rules for you - whatever you like" #TOpoli
...they are in Canada. We are doing the same job, why not the same laws? It's an open market for uber." #TOpoli #notequal #notfair
Nasim drives Beck: "You know (the playing field) is obviously not level. There should be the same rules for both of us. We're in Canada...
No stickers on ubers. Ignoring no-flagging rule. Enforcement is non-existent. People like Syed have to watch. #TOpoli #unfair #notequal
Taxi industry paid for inspections. No cost to the City. Taxi operators wanted inspections. Uber didn't. They scrapped all of it. #TOpoli
Taxi News asked me for comment. Here's what I said about Toronto's backwards By-Law: Turned back the clock. Repeating history. #TOpoli
When you call MLS for details about enactment of new rules, no one there has answers. Literally saying "we don't know". #TOpoli
If the taxi file is any indication of our City's ability to make and enact decisions we should all be very concerned. #TOpoli
City of Toronto closed VFH inspection facility. Haven't told anyone when to submit safety certificates & don't know when they will. #TOpoli
@globalnewsto @TomHayesNews Syed is a fantastic example of a hard-working man who came to Canada and has raised his family here. Thank you.
Syed. He's wonderful. #Toronto https://t.co/XXbOXYt9jL
@moore_oliver @globeandmail She made the right decision for right now.

When it's time to work you'll be able to focus on one thing at a time. I've been much more productive.
I feel fortunate to have been taking time for myself. As simple as listening to your own breathing. Stop the noise for a moment if you can.
@towhey I don't know but @NickKouvalis does apparently.
Tune in to @CP24Breakfast to win @motionballTO VIP tickets on behalf of @BeckTaxi! $50 Beck Bucks too! #greatevent #charity #SpecialOlympics
@allengreenwood @robmackay1701a @dmrider Thankfully not by way of increased congestion on arterial roads.
@allengreenwood @robmackay1701a @dmrider "Tell me what to do or I'm doing this" is not a solution. It's their job to have the right answer.
@allengreenwood @robmackay1701a @dmrider Not in tolls. It's not only drivers on the Gardiner who "pay" when tolls come. Everyone does.
@allengreenwood @robmackay1701a @dmrider Tolls won't help transit. They'll maintain roads that already exist, maintain traffic, nothing more
@allengreenwood @robmackay1701a @dmrider Can't implement tolls when there is no possibility to improve congestion as a result.
Tolls are an option only when there are options for travellers. Options don't exist right now. #TOpoli
It's annoying - this idea that everyone in Toronto wanted tolls. Not true.
@sunlorrie Political stunt or not, it's the right move. Toronto isn't ready for tolls.
Are Councillors supporting tolls so removed that they don't see there are no options for people to change travel behaviour? #TOpoli
@jpags A flat fee is the opposite of "latest technology" when distance-based makes more sense. Toronto isn't ready to talk tolls. #TOpoli
@lajeer @dmrider Residential property taxes are more expensive in 905.
@dmrider Not just 905. I'm in the 416. Tolls are not appropriate right now.
Now is not the time for tolls. #TOpoli #ONpoli
@MichaelColl4 @nadinetkat @torontoist If he wanted to meet I suppose I could. Again, have never had a conversation with him.
Love this! steele0o7's photo https://t.co/R9V7EFKw9x #Toronto #taxi #Beck
@nadinetkat @torontoist He blocked me even though we've never spoken, proceeded to tweet that I am disingenuous, I couldn't see the tweet.
@YashYanthi @BeckTaxi Got it! Thanks!
@YashYanthi Hey! When was this? Just now? I'll be in touch Yashy! @BeckTaxi
Talking to drivers on our Scarborough/East York channel about #BellLetsTalk and where they can go to get help for themselves, family, etc.
